name: Ultraset Sketchpad
body:

### text and contents
#### what
    _Augmented Reality Sketch Book_
    Make and Augmented Reality Sketch-book/cover?
    make drawings, sello for money
    With it you can trace digial images and draw them with pen and pencil on 
    diy text,  neo lucida, texst   Osmo text , [[http://www.cultofmac.com/237579/camera-lucida-use-your-iphones-camera-to-help-you-draw-on-paper/][camera lucida text]]

    Keywords
        ultraset-trace       ultraset-sketching
        Magic lens
        Static peephole
        Sketching
        Virtual tracing
               
#### how
##### hardware
    What you need:
      - two sheets A4 of Xmm thick FoarmCore
      - selfie stick phone holder
      - a cutter knife
      - glue gun

     Step 1. Cut the following size rectangles
     Step 2. Hot glue it together
     Step 3. Glue selfy stick hear

- bacause you can use the zoom for details
- use cases:
